guide.introduction: Whey pay to for city water to water your garden or clean you car. This system will rely on rain water storage that would be sent to a creek otherwise. It is a huge sustainability issue where resources are optimally to be used proximal to their provenance. In this case it also decreases erosion issues and provides for less infrastructure to manage downstream facilities.

guide.summary: Direct roof rainwater drains to the lowest point before it exits to the city sewer.  a 2500 gallon tank is placed underground in a flow through mode and a submersible pumpis operated b a demand valve when water is called for from a garden or other non pot
